# read in data
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
here::here()

col <- read_xlsx(here("data",
                      "coleop.final.meta.xlsx")) %>%
  # filter out taxa above family
  filter(`final % sim` > 90) %>%
  mutate(final_order = "", 
         final_family = case_when(family_name!="NA" ~ family_name,
                                  TRUE ~ "")) %>%
  select(final_order, final_family, 1:4)

write.csv(col, "data/coleop.family.lookup.csv", row.names = F)

```
